entries.title: The Collapse of the UK’s Electric Vehicle Champion
entries.description: Britishvolt promised investors it would be the cornerstone of the country’s battery industry. Now it faces bankruptcy.

entries.title: Big Tech’s Layoffs Highlight How the US Fails Immigrant Workers
entries.description: Decades-old visa rules mean that job cuts disadvantage workers, companies, and perhaps the whole country.

entries.title: Life as a 21st-Century Trucker
entries.description: Technology, corporate greed, and supply-chain chaos are transforming life behind the wheel of a big rig. I went on the road to find exactly how.
